title: Opal

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is control immune, you will instead roleblock them. If they are immune to roleblocks, they will still be roleblocked.
- You will learn your target's role when you control therm.
- Twice per game you can deal a basic attack to your target. You may use both attack charges on the same night to deal an attack to your target and who you control your target into. If you use both charges on the same night, the person who you control will not use their ability on the person they visit.
